text: Max Park is an American solver of the Rubik's Cube. As of September 24, 2022, he holds the world record for solving five cubes in a row. His fastest average time is 4.86 seconds per cube.and he has a world record with a time of 3.13 seconds ==References== Category:Living people Category:World record holders Category:2001 births Category:Korean people Category:People from California Category:People on the autism spectrum
title: Max Park
